text.name: Seal of Sunset
text.description:
{Seal of Sunset}

Worn on a finger, this item reduces the Power skill of enemy hero by 10% during combat.
text.event: It's never nice to get hit in the noggin by a fist with a heavy ring on the finger. Still, that's what happened to you in a friendly sparring with an old hero acquaintance, and after that, you couldn't manage the simplest spell to relieve dizziness for quite a while. During the booze-up after the sparring, the ring migrated over to your digit.
